Articles.Content:
Hi I'm a complete Noob, but how do I import the repository zip files into the game to use the add ons? Do I simply add them to the game folder to use or something else?

Thank you.

Fenland

(I realise that this probably isn't the correct forum to use, but wasn't sure.)

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=997.0

Place any extracted mod folder into your parts folder. And please look around a bit more. The forum has every basic aspect of the game covered. Thanks.

Here's a picture to further explain.
